name: Masked and Anonymous
tagline: A singer, whose career has gone on a downward spiral, is forced to make a comeback to the performance stage for a benefit concert.

name: Noah's Arc: Jumping the Broom
tagline: As Noah and Wade prepare to marry in Martha's Vineyard, the personal problems of their friends - and the unexpected arrival of rapper Baby Gat - threatens to permanently end their relationship.

name: Prefontaine
tagline: Based on the life of Olympic hopeful Steve Prefontaine, a long distance runner who lived in Oregon and died young

name: Where Do We Go Now?
tagline: A group of Lebanese women try to ease religious tensions between Christians and Muslims in their village.

name: La danse
tagline: The film follows the production of seven ballets by the Paris Opera Ballet.

name: Sex, Drugs, Rock & Roll
tagline: Performance artist/comedian Bogosian brings to hilarious life 10 separate oddball characters in a one-man-show. This profane, smart, crisply edited film will have you screaming for more.

name: Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead
tagline: Five different criminals face imminent death after botching a job quite badly.

name: Highway
tagline: Right before her wedding, a young woman finds herself abducted and held for ransom. As the initial days pass, she begins to develop a strange bond with her kidnapper.

name: Earth
tagline: It's 1947 and the borderlines between India and Pakistan are being drawn. A young girl bears witnesses to tragedy as her ayah is caught between the love of two men and the rising tide of political and religious violence.

production.name: New York Foundation for the Arts

name: Max
tagline: A film studying the depiction of a friendship between an art dealer named Rothman and his student, Adolf Hitler.

name: Being Flynn
tagline: Working in a Boston homeless shelter, Nick Flynn re-encounters his father, a con man and self-proclaimed poet. Sensing trouble in his own life, Nick wrestles with the notion of reaching out yet again to his dad.

name: Bread and Roses
tagline: Two Latina sisters work as cleaners in a downtown office building, and fight for the right to unionize.

name: Unconditional
tagline: A woman's idyllic life is shattered when her husband is killed in a senseless act of violence. As she prepares to take matters into her own hands, two unexpected encounters begin to change everything.

name: Proof
tagline: The life of a blind photographer who is looked after by a housekeeper is disrupted by the arrival of an agreeable restaurant worker.

name: The Lonely Passion of Judith Hearne
tagline: She falls in love with a broken down former NYC hotel doorman, who tells Judith vaguely that he was in the hotel business.

name: Trouble the Water
tagline: A redemptive tale of an aspiring rap artist surviving failed levees and her own troubled past and seizing a chance for a new beginning.

name: Man on Fire
tagline: A former CIA agent, John Creasy, is hired as a bodyguard for a girl in Italy, who becomes the daughter he never had. When she is abducted, Creasy's fiery rage is unleashed, and despite being badly wounded, embarks on a bloody revenge spree.

name: The Reluctant Fundamentalist
tagline: A young Pakistani man is chasing corporate success on Wall Street. He finds himself embroiled in a conflict between his American Dream, a hostage crisis, and the enduring call of his family's homeland.

name: Thelonious Monk: Straight, No Chaser
tagline: A documentary film about the life of pianist and jazz great Thelonious Monk. Features live performances by Monk and his band, and interviews with friends and family about the offbeat genius.

name: A Guide to Recognizing Your Saints
tagline: The movie is a coming-of-age drama about a boy growing up in Astoria, N.Y., during the 1980s. As his friends end up dead, on drugs or in prison, he comes to believe he has been saved from their fate by various so-called saints.

name: The Trials of Henry Kissinger
tagline: A film about the war crimes of the American diplomat, Henry Kissinger.

name: Preacher's Kid
tagline: Tired of being a Preacher's daughter and longing to experience more of life, 20-something ANGIE KING strikes out on her own for the very first time and joins a traveling gospel show.

name: The Names of Love
tagline: A young, extroverted left-wing activist who sleeps with her political opponents to convert them to her cause is successful until she meets her match.

name: Safe
tagline: An affluent and unexceptional homemaker in the suburbs develops multiple chemical sensitivity.

name: Delgo
tagline: Delgo, an adventurous but naive teenager, must rally his group of friends to protect their world from conflict between the Lockni and Nohrin people.

name: Roger & Me
tagline: Director Michael Moore pursues GM CEO Roger Smith to confront him about the harm he did to Flint, Michigan with his massive downsizing.

name: Annie
tagline: Broadway musical based on the Little Orphan Annie comic strip. A young orphan girls adventures in finding a family that will take her.

name: Bully
tagline: Based on a true story. Naive teenagers plot to murder one of their own, who has been too much of a bully to them.

name: Jaan-E-Mann: Let's Fall in Love... Again
Radio City Revels
tagline: A songwriter uses the songs one of his pupils writes while sleeping for his own contract.

name: Madison
tagline: A story about a man's personal struggle to victory in the 1971 Madison, Indiana hydro-plane regatta.

name: The Grey Zone
tagline: A Nazi doctor, along with the Sonderkomando, Jews who are forced to work in the crematoria of Auschwitz against their fellow Jews, find themselves in a moral grey zone.

name: Manna from Heaven
tagline: What happens when you get a "gift from god" (a financial windfall), but, many years later, find out it was just a loan -- due immediately....

name: Shut Up and Play the Hits
tagline: On April 2nd 2011, LCD Soundsystem played its final show at Madison Square Garden. Documenting this once in a life time performance and an intimate portrait of James Murphy as he navigates the lead-up to the show, the day after, and the personal and professional ramifications of his decision.

name: Pound Puppies and the Legend of Big Paw
Heartbreaker
tagline: Alex and his sister run a business designed to break up relationships. They are hired by a rich man to break up the wedding of his daughter. The only problem is that they only have one week to do so.

name: Besharam
tagline: A car thief falls in love with a woman whose car he has stolen.

name: Big Eden
tagline: Big Eden is a small, fictional northwestern Montana town.

name: The Return
tagline: In the Russian wilderness, two brothers face a range of new, conflicting emotions when their father - a man they know only through a single photograph - resurfaces.

name: Echelon Conspiracy
tagline: At first, the strange phone messages promised great wealth. Soon, though, government agents pursue the young engineer receiving them around the world.

name: Hardware Wars
tagline: This is a short parody of the movie Star Wars.

name: A Polish Vampire in Burbank
tagline: A somewhat reluctant vampire is taken out by his sexpot sister for his first "night out on the town."

name: The Passion of the Christ
tagline: A film detailing the final hours and crucifixion of Jesus Christ.

name: Bride Flight
tagline: A romantic drama that charts the lives of three women from different backgrounds, forever changed when they emigrate to New Zealand as war brides.

production.name: Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

name: Scatter My Ashes at Bergdorf's
tagline: A documentary on the Manhattan department store with interviews from an array of fashion designers, style icons, and celebrities.

name: Dom Hemingway
tagline: After spending 12 years in prison for keeping his mouth shut, notorious safe-cracker Dom Hemingway is back on the streets of London looking to collect what he's owed.

name: Mr. Death: The Rise and Fall of Fred A. Leuchter, Jr.
tagline: A cinematic portrait of the life and career of the infamous American execution device designer and holocaust denier.

name: Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed
tagline: A company president gets framed with a food-poisoning scandal and the only person who can help him is the evening cleaning-woman, who always seems to be at the right place at the right time.

name: Hands on a Hard Body: The Documentary
Jack's Back
tagline: A serial killer in Los Angeles celebrates Jack the Ripper's 100th birthday by committing similar murders.

name: Jackals
tagline: Cops in a small town near the Mexican border find themselves caught up in a scheme that smuggles illegal aliens into the country.

name: How to Make Love to a Negro Without Getting Tired
Tape
tagline: Three old high school friends pass the time in a Michigan motel room dissecting the painful memories of their high school years.

name: Seducing Doctor Lewis

production.name: Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)
Fonds de télévision et de câblodistribution pour la porduction d'émissions canadiennes

tagline: A much-needed boost, in the form of a new factory, is promised to the residents of the tiny fishing village St. Marie-La-Mauderne, provided they can lure a doctor to take up full-time residency on the island. Inspired, the villagers devise a scheme to make Dr. Christopher Lewis a local.

name: Cube
tagline: 7 complete strangers of widely varying personality characteristics are involuntarily placed in an endless kafkaesque maze containing deadly traps.

name: Shaolin Soccer
tagline: A young Shaolin follower reunites with his discouraged brothers to form a soccer team using their martial art skills to their advantage.

name: Bonneville
tagline: Three women take a road trip to Santa Barbara in order to deliver the ashes of one of their dead husbands to his resentful daughter.

name: The Inevitable Defeat of Mister & Pete
tagline: A coming-of-age story about two inner city boys who are left to fend for themselves over the summer after their mothers are taken away by the authorities.

name: Krazzy 4
tagline: 4 mental patients formulate the plan to rescue their kidnapped doctor and teach the kidnappers a lesson.

name: September
tagline: At a summer house in Vermont, neighbor Howard falls in love with Lane, who's in a relationship with Peter, who's falling for Stephanie, who's married with children.

name: Paranoid Park
tagline: A teenage skateboarder's life begins to fray after he is involved in the accidental death of a security guard.

name: Ai Weiwei: Never Sorry
tagline: A documentary that chronicles artist and activist Ai Weiwei as he prepares for a series of exhibitions and gets into an increasing number of clashes with the Chinese government.

name: The Act of Killing
tagline: A documentary which challenges former Indonesian death-squad leaders to reenact their mass-killings in whichever cinematic genres they wish, including classic Hollywood crime scenarios and lavish musical numbers.

name: SubUrbia
tagline: A group of suburban teenagers try to support each other through the difficult task of becoming adults.

name: Strayed
tagline: Emmanuelle Béart stars as a widowed schoolteacher who flees Nazi-occupied Paris with her children. A teenaged boy comes to their rescue by leading them into the forest -- their best shot at survival.
